project.name: unionExample
project.description: A Union window unites two or more event streams using a strict policy or a loose policy.Â This model contains a Union window that uses a strict policy to merge three event streams of stock market trades together. Input windows that stream events to a Union window must have the same schema.

window-source.name: sourceWindow_01
window-source.description: The first Source window in this model receives input data from two CSV files each containing a list of stock market trades. The input data specifies a unique ID for the trade, the company's stock market symbol, and the price paid for the stock.

window-source.name: sourceWindow_02
window-source.description: The second Source window in this model receives input data from a CSV file containing a list of stock market trades. The input data specifies a unique ID for the trade, the company's stock market symbol, and the price paid for the stock.

window-union.name: unionWindow
window-union.description: The Union window in this model merges the three event streams of stock market trades. As strict policy is enabled, the key merge from each window must semantically merge cleanly.
